lead_paragraph: Former Leicester City manager Nigel Pearson is backing the Foxes to finish in the top four of the Premier League but insists he can take some credit for their remarkable reverse in fortunes.

headline.print_headline: Foxes Can Finish Top Four but Give Me Some Credit-Pearson
headline.main: Foxes Can Finish Top Four but Give Me Some Credit-Pearson

snippet: Former Leicester City manager Nigel Pearson is backing the Foxes to finish in the top four of the Premier League but insists he can take some credit for their remarkable reverse in fortunes....
